overview.summary: Select a subset of a field.

net.title: ClipFieldByFunction-byvalue Regression Test
net.p: This network demonstrates using the ClipFieldByFunction module to extract the lungs from the torso model. The lungs are already classified in the torso model and have a particular conductivity table entry of 4, so we can extract all of the elements from the torso with conductivity of 4 and just get the lungs.

Note that alternatively we could use 'v != 4' to get a model with the lungs removed. Or we could use the different values in the field to single out the ribs, heart, and others that were already classified.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/NewField/ClipFieldByFunction-byvalue.net.

net.title: ClipFieldByFunction-positional Regression Test
net.p: This demonstrates using ClipFieldByFunction to chop out a wedge from a field so that we can more easily view the interior. The original field is draw in a transparent wireframe for reference.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/NewField/ClipFieldByFunction-positional.net.
